sourcesContent:
<template>
      <v-container>
        <v-form ref="form" class="login-form">
          <v-text-field
            v-model="email"
            :rules="[(v) => !!v || 'Email is required']"
            label="Email"
            required
          ></v-text-field>

          <v-text-field
            v-model="password"
            :rules="[(v) => !!v || 'Password is required']"
            label="Password"
            required
            type="password"
          ></v-text-field>

          <v-btn @click="submit" color="primary">Login</v-btn>
        </v-form>
      </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      email: '',
      password: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    submit () {
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        // Form is valid, proceed with login logic
        console.log('Form is valid')
        // Here you can add your login logic
      } else {
        console.log('Form is not valid')
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.login-form {
  width: 300px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
</style>
